item.title: SHAP - a reliable way to analyze model interpretability
item.description: SHAP is the most popular model-agnostic technique that is used to explain predictions. SHAP stands for SHapley Additive exPlanations Shapely values are obtained by incorporating concepts fromÂ Cooperative Game TheoryÂ andÂ local explanations

item.title: What is dB
item.description: dB is short for decibel, which is a unit that indicates ratio or gain.Â It is often used to measure sound intensity, signal strength, attenuation and other quantities.
